meta.description: Optimize the allocation of products among six international warehouses to meet their needs at the lowest transportation cost.

sets.name: WAREHOUSES
sets.description: Set of warehouses involved in the logistics problem.

params.name: current_inventory
params.description: Current inventory levels at each warehouse.

params.name: required_inventory
params.description: Required inventory levels at each warehouse.

params.name: transport_cost
params.description: Cost of transporting one unit of product between each pair of warehouses.

vars.name: flow
vars.description: Amount of product transported from one warehouse to another.

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(transport_cost[i][j] * flow[i][j] for i in WAREHOUSES for j in WAREHOUSES if i != j)
objective.description: Minimize the total transportation cost of reallocating products among warehouses.

constraints.name: balance_warehouse_1
constraints.expr_lhs: current_inventory['1'] + sum(flow[j]['1'] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '1') - sum(flow['1'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '1')
constraints.description: Ensure warehouse 1 meets its required inventory level.

constraints.name: balance_warehouse_2
constraints.expr_lhs: current_inventory['2'] + sum(flow[j]['2'] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '2') - sum(flow['2'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '2')
constraints.description: Ensure warehouse 2 meets its required inventory level.

constraints.name: balance_warehouse_3
constraints.expr_lhs: current_inventory['3'] + sum(flow[j]['3'] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '3') - sum(flow['3'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '3')
constraints.description: Ensure warehouse 3 meets its required inventory level.

constraints.name: balance_warehouse_4
constraints.expr_lhs: current_inventory['4'] + sum(flow[j]['4'] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '4') - sum(flow['4'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '4')
constraints.description: Ensure warehouse 4 meets its required inventory level.

constraints.name: balance_warehouse_5
constraints.expr_lhs: current_inventory['5'] + sum(flow[j]['5'] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '5') - sum(flow['5'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '5')
constraints.description: Ensure warehouse 5 meets its required inventory level.

constraints.name: balance_warehouse_6
constraints.expr_lhs: current_inventory['6'] + sum(flow[j]['6'] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '6') - sum(flow['6'][j] for j in WAREHOUSES if j != '6')
constraints.description: Ensure warehouse 6 meets its required inventory level.
